original_text: and the woman fled into the wilderness, where she has a place prepared by God, in which she is to be nourished for 1,260 days.
korean_text: 그 여자가 광야로 도망하매 거기서 천이백육십 일 동안 그를 양육하기 위하여 하나님께서 예비하신 곳이 있더라

sentences.original_text: and the woman fled into the wilderness
where she has a place prepared by God
in which she is to be nourished for 1,260 days
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 그녀는 1,260일 동안 양육을 받을 것이라
